text:
@realDonaldTrump Good thing you got that wall built.

No way did the coronavirus come through Europe...
No way is that the reason NY was so hard hit...

And no way will any cases come through South America...

Fool. I see a lot of your rascist base was out today.

Morons.
#TrumpHasNoPlan
